messages.title: A clear choice...
messages.content: Hard working Lib Dem Gareth Epps. Yet another Tory MP.

messages.title: Labour and the Greens are out of the race in Reading East.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Gareth is committed to tackling climate change. He has forced Reading Council to be better on the environment. Gareth will be a 'Green MP' for Reading East.
Gareth will be a fresh start for Reading East. He is campaigning to protect vital local services.
Gareth is campaigning to get tax cuts for ordinary local families in Reading to help us through the recession.

mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Conservatives, Tory, Labour MP, Margie Mims, Labour, Green Party
mentions.tacticalSituation: Local people switching to back Gareth and the Lib Dems, in the knowledge Labour can't win and make sure Reading East gets the fresh start it deserves.

issues.economy: Gareth is campaigning to get tax cuts for ordinary local families in Reading to help us through the recession.
issues.environment: Gareth is committed to tackling climate change. He has forced Reading Council to be better on the environment.

housing.content: Gareth will be a fresh start for Reading East. He is campaigning to protect vital local services. Local people switching to back Gareth and the Lib Dems.

leaflet.personalStatement: Gareth has a proven record of action. He has worked hard as a local councillor and can be trusted to always stand up for local people.

politicalExperience.achievements: He has worked hard as a local councillor and can be trusted to always stand up for local people.

images.caption: A clear choice... Hard working Lib Dem Gareth Epps OR Yet another Tory MP.
